data.text: @andyj1979 2/2 Sarah Gilbert (with her international team of scientists and clinical trial volunteers across the world) expressed it well “we're seeing it as a race against the virus, not a race against other vaccine developers”.

@andyj1979 1/2 It is certainly great news, scientific advances have always been collaborative and the beauty of knowledge is it knows no geographic boundaries. As Newton said “If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants." So there is no need for UK trumpet blowing,
@andyj1979 Great news re the approval.   I don’t think we can pat ourselves on the back for anything given our awful numbers.
